author: ajaquith
msg: Re-factored the authentication subsystem to remove the need for JAAS configuration files. WEB-INF/jspwiki.jaas goes away, as does the need for PolicyLoader. Also, responsibilities for web authentication move to WikiServletFilter. Authentication is now configured via jspwiki.properties -- see that file for details. WikiSession API change: getLoginContext() vanishes.

author: ajaquith
msg: Re-factored the authentication subsystem to remove the need for JAAS configuration files. WEB-INF/jspwiki.jaas goes away, as does the need for PolicyLoader. Also, responsibilities for web authentication move to WikiServletFilter. Authentication is now configured via jspwiki.properties -- see that file for details. WikiSession API change: getLoginContext() vanishes.

author: ajaquith
msg: The auth.login.*LoginModule classes are mildly re-factored to remove any need to have knowledge of how to (or why) to inject JSPWiki Role principals. Responsibility for injecting Roles moves to WikiSession. JSPWiki can use ANY LoginModule for custom authentication now.

author: ajaquith
msg: Removed file because it was not needed.
